citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1030 am on
19-DEC-16.
Knocked on house door with no answer. Waited 30 minutes, knocked again, no answer.
